name: The Lotus Residence
address: Banjar Pandak Laing No.1, Pandak Bandung, Tabanan, Tabanan Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: We‚Äôve had a magical time at the Lotus Residence and we will be very happy to return next year. Thanks to the entire Lotus team who are all very professional and absolutely adorable without exception, you guys lifted our experience to the next level üôè THANK YOU üôè
review 2:
My family, my friends and myself came for a week end of Septembre 2023 for my wedding wich took place in the neighborhood.

What can I say about 'The lotus Residence', except that we had an amazing moment. Everyone in the group were really happy and seduce by the place and the staff.

Everything and the details were preftect.

You are in quiete place surronding by a wonderfull garden; many facilites are at your disposition for relaxation and sport.
Also what could it be an amazing place without an amazing staff, the staff was really professional, kind and helpfull. They will try to do their best to make your stay perfect.

After the wedding, when we back to the room, we were surrprised to find a nice present they give to us. Those details to customers are more than appreciate and touching.

I highly recomand this place stay
review 3:
An exquisite retreat from the chaos of Bali. Plenty of space to relax and either enjoy the company of my 9 travelling companions, Spa treatments or withdraw and find a beautiful space alone.

Beds are very comfortable and showers are hot with good water pressure and WiFi. We were well taken care of by an attentive housekeeping and driver team and a security team.

Chef Gusti delighted us every day with delicious indonesian dishes, he checked every day what we wanted to eat the following day and catered to our birthday celebration and dietary requirements.

A wonderful space for a group of 12 or smaller, 6 suites (two twin) and a large pavilion and pool to enjoy, also spa and sauna with plunge pool and yoga area in the spa area at bottom of property. Seems to be halfway between Seminyak and Ubud.

Stay here, the service and warmth of the people and the serenity of the space will not disappoint. I'm sorry to be leaving.
review 4:
Beautiful Villa!
Beyond expectations !!!!

6 bedrooms with HUGE lawn, lush forest view, great for small - medium scale function, have huge pool, cool jacuzzi, rice paddies (need serious maintanance thou) view, 2 plunge pool, space for.yoga or exercise, gazebo, another gazebo for secluded massage..

Staff were awesome and super assisting, helpful, friendly, even the security team!!!

Just follow the gmaps (waze almost lost me..) And drive slowly, you will notice the sign of The Lotus Resident before entering the 'gang' or small alley
review 5: Great place to stay. It's out of the hussell and Bussell. So relaxful and a beautiful place to stay.
